Topic.Title: How to make is so you need an item to go in a room.

Posts.EditableText: Hello! I am making my first game, and I want to make it so you need an item to enter a room. How do I do this?
Posts.HTML: Hello! I am making my first game, and I want to make it so you need an item to enter a room. How do I do this?

Posts.EditableText: It may be easier to back-up one room, and require the object to unlock that exit.
Posts.HTML: It may be easier to back-up one room, and require the object to unlock that exit.
